DOC.criteria: Patients must histologically cytologically confirm solid tumor refractory standard therapy standard therapy know exist , candidate standard therapy , nonHodgkin 's lymphoma Hodgkin 's disease refractory standard therapy ( i.e. , patient relapse follow least 2 prior therapy ) standard therapy know exist .
